onboardingSlides.title: Pool Funds with Friends & Family
onboardingSlides.description: Need to save for a group trip, a joint investment, or a shared expense? Contribiia Wallet makes it easy to pool funds securely. Set goals, track contributions, and reach financial milestones together.

onboardingSlides.title: Stay on Top of Your Credit Score!
onboardingSlides.description: Monitor, understand, and improve your credit score effortlessly. Get real-time insights, smart recommendations, and take control of your financial future.

onboardingSlides.title: Your Security, Our Priority
onboardingSlides.description: Sleep soundly knowing your finances are protected by state-of-the-art security. Contribiia Wallet is a digital fortress, safeguarding your assets with cutting-edge encryption. Trust, transact, and thrive worry-free.

onboardingSlides.title: Meet Contribiia Wallet â€“ Your Financial Hub!
onboardingSlides.description: Say goodbye to scattered accounts and hello to seamless money management. Contribiia Wallet brings all your financial assets together in one secure, easy-to-use space, your all-in-one financial companion.
